forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and a few thundershowers likely during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High near 15C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and a few thundershowers likely during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High around 60F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
